pageProduct.name: Opsite Flexigrid 10cm x12cm Single
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

A sterile clear, adhesive, waterproof and bacteria-proof film dressing.

Directions

Peel back protective backing and place film dressing on wound. Gently press around the wound to seal. Remove the clear plastic grid on top of the film dressing. To remove dressing, lift one corner and slowly stretch outwards from the centre. This breaks the adhesive bond and allows the film to lift easily. Can be left on clean and non-infected wounds for up to seven days depending on fluid or bleeding.
